entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY, Kapuskasing
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:31 p.m. EDT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snowshower, -4.6Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kapuskasing Airport 8:00 PM EDT Thursday 6 April 2023
Condition: Light Snowshower
Temperature: -4.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.7 kPa rising
Visibility: 15 km
Humidity: 73 %
Wind Chill: -11
Dewpoint: -8.7°C
Wind: W 21 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this evening then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of snow squalls early this evening. Local blowing snow early this evening. Local amount 2 cm. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Wind northwest 20 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Cloudy. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early in the evening. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 5 in the evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Thursday 6 April 2023
